title: 2020 DDoS Extortion Campaign -- A Sequel More Thrilling Than the Original
description: As the go-to enterprise distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) mitigation experts, our phones have been "ringing off the hook" since the release of the global extortion DDoS campaign sequel. This latest installment of the cybersecurity saga is bigger, badder, and features a broader cast of criminal characters than seen previously with last year's extortion-related activity.
author: Susan McReynolds
